title: He cant log in....
body: My friend is having some account issues , he recently logged in and played a game with me and then the next day he cant log on. I've asked him whether he has computer issues , the right information , caps lock , number lock , etc. He replied that he had everything in place and even sent for a password reset , which hasn't arrived yet.  I just would like this to be publicly known because he is a paying customer in a free to play game. Thank you for your time.

replies.body: Suck to hear about your friend having issues logging in, but I'd like to help!  Does he have the correct region selected on the patcher?  He can check on the top right and change it.  This is a common occurrence, so let me know!
